mapper.select: SELECT /* LocalSciMapper.getSellerKey, AID로 SELLER KEY 조회 , 이석희/아이에스플러스, 2014-02-13 */ SELLER_MBR_NO FROM ( SELECT A.SELLER_MBR_NO FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_APP_PROD B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000201' AND A.TOP_MENU_ID != 'DP02' AND B.AID = #{aid} ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT /* LocalSciMapper.selectProductInfo, 상품 기본정보(서비스 그룹) 조회 , 이석희/아이에스플러스, 2014-03-24 */ A.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , B.PROD_ID , A.SVC_GRP_CD , A.SVC_TYPE_CD , A.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.META_CLSF_CD , A.TOP_MENU_ID , C.CATALOG_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = B.PART_PROD_ID AND B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID(+) AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{productId} AND C.BASE_YN(+) ='Y' AND C.USE_YN(+) ='Y' AND D.TENANT_ID =#{tenantId}
SELECT /* LocalSciMapper.getDcdSupportProduct, DCD 상품 조회 , 이석희/아이에스플러스, 2014-02-17 */ PROD_ID ,DCD_SPRT_CD FROM TB_DP_DCD_APP_PROD WHERE (DCD_SPRT_CD ='PD005201' OR DCD_SPRT_CD ='Y')
